overview:
With an innate ability to co-ordinate communication and facilitate the execution of projects, Jana currently acts as chief operations officer for South African online billing startup, SnapBill. Jana acts a liaison between clients and staff and oversees the day to day practical operation of SnapBill.

Jana (27), received training at the University of Pretoria in Graphic Design and Architecture and pursued a career in public relations and marketing management. Several years of rising through the organisational and logistic ranks in the demanding South African motorsport industry prepared her for the challenges of running the daily operations at SnapBill. Jana brings her creative vision, organisational skill and awesomeness to the SnapBill team.
